// using local storage as data base
var addToDb=function addToDb(id){var savedData=getDb();var shopping_cart={};if(!savedData){shopping_cart[id]=1;}else{shopping_cart=JSON.parse(savedData);if(shopping_cart[id]){return;}else{shopping_cart[id]=1;}}updateDb(shopping_cart);};var getDb=function getDb(){return localStorage.getItem("shopping_cart");};var updateDb=function updateDb(cart){localStorage.setItem("shopping_cart",JSON.stringify(cart));};var removeFromDb=function removeFromDb(id){var exists=getDb();if(!exists){}else{var shopping_cart=JSON.parse(exists);delete shopping_cart[id];updateDb(shopping_cart);}};var getStoredData=function getStoredData(){var exists=getDb();return exists?JSON.parse(exists):{};console.log(exists);};var clearCourses=function clearCourses(){localStorage.removeItem("shopping_cart");};export{addToDb,removeFromDb as deleteFromLocal,clearCourses as clearProducts,getStoredData};
